biotools.summary: EGPred implements a new strategy where the specificity is maintained while the sensitivity is increased on combining ab initio predictions with BLASTX exons that are filtered using criteria such as length of HSP alignment, percent identity, score, expectation value, and similarity to intron sequences.

bioschemas.name: egpred
bioschemas.summary: EGPred implements a new strategy where the specificity is maintained while the sensitivity is increased on combining ab initio predictions with BLASTX exons that are filtered using criteria such as length of HSP alignment, percent identity, score, expectation value, and similarity to intron sequences.
